name: impotence_diagnosis_status
description: Status indicating whether a patient has been diagnosed with impotence.

name: impotence_treatment_status
description: Status indicating whether a patient is receiving treatment for impotence.

name: treatment_surgical_penile_prosthesis_implantation
description: Indicates if surgical implantation of a penile prosthesis is a covered treatment option for impotence.

name: treatment_nonsurgical_medical
description: Indicates if medical treatment is a covered nonsurgical option for impotence.

name: treatment_nonsurgical_psychotherapeutic
description: Indicates if psychotherapeutic treatment is a covered nonsurgical option for impotence.

name: abuse_suspected_documentation_request_flag
description: Flag indicating whether documentation of appropriateness may be requested if abuse related to the condition or treatment is suspected.

name: treatment_linked_to_mental_condition_flag
description: Flag indicating if treatment for impotence is furnished in connection with a mental condition.

name: patient_is_hospital_inpatient_for_mental_condition_treatment
description: Flag indicating if the patient receiving treatment in connection with a mental condition is a hospital inpatient (relevant for psychiatric service limitation).

name: psychiatric_service_limitation_applies
description: Flag indicating if the psychiatric service limitation applies for treatment furnished to patients (other than hospital inpatients) in connection with a mental condition.
